item.title: PepsiCo earnings beat estimates, but demand for drinks and snacks drops in North America
item.description: PepsiCo's earnings topped Wall Street's estimates, but the company's revenue missed expectations, as drink and snack demand fell in North America.

item.title: PayPal reports fourth-quarter earnings beat as growth picks up at Venmo
item.description: PayPal reported better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and revenue in its quarterly report on Tuesday.

item.title: Luxury carmaker Ferrari posts 21% hike in full-year profit, sees 2025 growth
item.description: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in full-year net profit, citing a strong product mix and growing demand for personal...

item.title: Pfizer tops earnings estimates as Covid product sales beat expectations and cost cuts pay off
item.description: The results cap off a critical year for Pfizer, which has been slashing costs as it recovers from the rapid decline of its Covid business and stock pr...

item.title: Merck's 2025 revenue outlook falls short as it pauses Gardasil vaccine shipments to China
item.description: Merck's full-year 2025 revenue guidance fell short of what some analysts were expecting, at a range of $64.1 billion to $65.6 billion.
